mods.abstract: Skinning the rat. This is a necessary procedure of the trapping industry. The trappers will skin from 3,000,000 to 6,000,000 of these fur-bearing animals yearly. Louisiana leads all other states of the Union in the production of muskrat and mink furs.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
